title: Cathie Wood's Ark Invest Sells $5.8M in Coinbase, Grayscale Bitcoin Trust Shares as Crypto Market Surges
description: As Bitcoin jumped over 10% amid renewed hopes of a spot ETF approval, Ark Invest opted to sell some of its Bitcoin-related assets.

title: Billionaire Paul Tudor Jones Says US in Weakest Financial Position Since World War II
description:
Hedge fund billionaire Paul Tudor Jones is warning that the United States is at its most economically precarious point in over 70 years. In a recent CNBC interview, the legendary investor says that tough times lie ahead for the United States as the country’s debt burden continues to soar with the world embroiled in geopolitical […]

The post Billionaire Paul Tudor Jones Says US in Weakest Financial Position Since World War II appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
